title: 灵异的一段文字
author: 星辰rs
txt_content:
今天玩1.5.2.游戏突然崩溃了。出现了下面的一段英语：It has been reported that some victims of torture, during the act, would retreat into a fantasy world from which they could not WAKE UP. In this catatonic state, the victim lived in a world just like their normal one, except they weren't being tortured. The only way that they realized they needed to WAKE UP was a note they found in their fantasy world. It would tell them about their condition, and tell them to WAKE UP. Even then, it would often take months until they were ready to discard their fantasy world and PLEASE WAKE UP.（乱码中剪辑出来的）
问一下这什么意思，出自何处

replies.txt_content: 放弃吧← ←你根本就没出现乱码并且Minecraft没有Herobrine这个东西

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content: 别逗 你是从网上关于him的传说中复制粘贴的吧

replies.author: 战神1434
replies.txt_content:
据报道,一些酷刑的受害者,在行动,将倒退到一个幻想世界,他们无法醒来。在这种紧张状态,受害者生活在一个世界,就像正常,除了他们不被折磨。的唯一途径,他们意识到他们需要醒来注意他们发现在他们的幻想世界。它会告诉他们关于他们的病情,告诉他们醒来。即便如此,它常常需要几个月,直到他们准备抛弃幻想我们
（翻译后）
